mapper.select: SELECT hld.HOLDING_ID, hld.QTY, hld.INVESTED_AMOUNT, hld.S_ID, stk.S_ID, stk.S_NAME, stk.S_CODE, stk.S_LTP, stk.S_ASSET_CLASS FROM SC_HOLDING hld LEFT JOIN SC_STOCK_SECURITIES stk ON hld.s_id = stk.s_id where hld.account_number = #{value}

SELECT hld.HOLDING_ID, hld.QTY, hld.INVESTED_AMOUNT, hld.S_ID, stk.S_ID, stk.S_NAME, stk.S_CODE, stk.S_LTP, stk.S_ASSET_CLASS FROM SC_HOLDING hld LEFT JOIN SC_STOCK_SECURITIES stk ON hld.s_id = stk.s_id where hld.account_number = #{acctnum} and hld.s_id = #{s_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SC_HOLDING(HOLDING_ID, S_ID, QTY, INVESTED_AMOUNT, ACCOUNT_NUMBER) VALUES( #{holding.holdingId}, #{holding.sId}, #{holding.holdingQuantity}, #{holding.investedAmount}, #{acctnum})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SC_HOLDING WHERE ACCOUNT_NUMBER = #{acctnum} AND s_id = #{holding.sId}
mapper.update: UPDATE SC_HOLDING SET HOLDING_ID = #{holding.holdingId}, QTY = #{holding.holdingQuantity}, INVESTED_AMOUNT = #{holding.investedAmount} WHERE ACCOUNT_NUMBER = #{acctnum} AND S_ID = #{holding.sId}
